snippet: Iran and Russia support President Bashar al-Assad of Syria, while the United States and Saudi Arabia support an array of Mr. Assad’s opponents.
abstract: Iran suggests that it may withdraw from Syria peace talks amid tensions with Saudi Arabia.

byline.original: By RICK GLADSTONE and DAVID E. SANGER
byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone reported from New York, and David E. Sanger from Astana, Kazakhstan.

lead_paragraph: Iran and Russia support President Bashar al-Assad of Syria, while the United States and Saudi Arabia support an array of Mr. Assad’s opponents.

headline.main: Iran Says It May Quit Talks on Syria Over Saudis’ Role
headline.print_headline: Iran Says It May Quit Talks on Syria Over Saudis’ Role
